name: Project: Groundhog Day
description:
ITS MY FIRST VIDEO GAME!!!!

this is not the game i set out to make but running low in time in the game jam this is what i ended up with. the lore of the game is the player is stuck in there own mind fighting off waves of monster. at what would have been the end of the game the player find out they are stuck in there own mind. the enemy spawner was coded in the last 6 min of the jam it may have problems, i plan on making this into a full game im in the process of starting a devblog for this game. thank you for plan please leave feed back on game thank you and have fun

controls

for right hand user a - d for right and left movement

for left hand user the arrows keys left and right will do the same thing

space bar is for jump

left mouse click is to shoot your weapon

press r to restart the room
